actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-626.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 242 - 166 (Record Vote No: 51).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5174) to provide for the appointment of United States bankruptcy judges under article III of the Constitution, to amend title 11 of the United States Code for the purpose of making certain changes in the personal bankruptcy law, of making certain changes regarding grain storage facilities, and of clarifying the circumstance under which collective-bargaining agreements may be rejected in cases under chapter 11, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5174 (bankruptcy law).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5174) to provide for the appointment of United States bankruptcy judges under article III of the Constitution, to amend title 11 of the United States Code for the purpose of making certain changes in the personal bankruptcy law, of making certain changes regarding grain storage facilities, and of clarifying the circumstance under which collective-bargaining agreements may be rejected in cases under chapter 11, and for other purposes.
